*Kit dived as she heard a gun setting up to fire, and ended up with her armour singed on her shoulder. She growls, she hadn't been expecting that. Kit gets up and laughs, liking the way it echoed around the woods*

*She sidesteps, avoiding a mine, and leaping onto the bot that fired at her in a feirce tackle*

Sent: May 11, 2000 6:03:25 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Sinesis heard something from behind...he set mines around the
area...remembering the locations....he aimed his blaster at where he heard
the sound...he spun around, fired at Death storm, and then spun around to
face his other attacker again.....
